kaggle_daily_demand.name: Daily Demand Forecasting Orders
kaggle_daily_demand.description: 60 days of daily demand with 13 features, perfect for MVP

columns_mapping.item_id: Day of the week (Monday to Friday)
columns_mapping.category: Week of the month (first week, second, third, fourth or fifth week

kaggle_daily_demand.preprocessing_notes: No date column - needs synthetic date generation from index. Daily granularity, clean structure, ready for ARIMA/Prophet

_evaluation.recommendation: LOW - Limited relevance, consider as external factor only

ieee_power_grid_reliability.name: Recent Advancements in Planning and Reliability Aspects of Large Power Grids
ieee_power_grid_reliability.description: Predictive maintenance for transmission systems, adaptable to telecom towers. Includes AI for maintenance with ROI from cost savings.
ieee_power_grid_reliability.preprocessing_notes: IEEE paper on power grid reliability and predictive maintenance. AI models for infrastructure maintenance.

_evaluation.recommendation: LOW - Limited relevance, consider as external factor only

kaggle_retail_inventory.name: Retail Store Inventory Forecasting
kaggle_retail_inventory.preprocessing_notes: Large scale dataset, test complex models (LSTM)

_evaluation.recommendation: LOW - Limited relevance, consider as external factor only

bacen_selic_rate.name: BACEN SELIC Interest Rate
bacen_selic_rate.description: SELIC interest rate (base rate) from Brazilian Central Bank
bacen_selic_rate.preprocessing_notes: SELIC rate affects cost of capital and inventory holding costs. Higher rates reduce optimal inventory levels.

_evaluation.recommendation: LOW - Limited relevance, consider as external factor only

bacen_ipca_12m.name: BACEN IPCA 12 Months (Inflation)
bacen_ipca_12m.description: IPCA inflation index accumulated over 12 months from BACEN
bacen_ipca_12m.preprocessing_notes: Inflation rate affects purchasing decisions. High inflation (>1%/month) increases demand anticipation.

_evaluation.recommendation: LOW - Limited relevance, consider as external factor only

ibge_ipca_monthly.name: IBGE IPCA Monthly (Inflation)
ibge_ipca_monthly.description: Monthly IPCA inflation index from IBGE SIDRA
ibge_ipca_monthly.preprocessing_notes: Monthly inflation data for economic external factors. More granular than BACEN IPCA 12M.
ibge_ipca_monthly.notes: Monthly inflation for short-term demand forecasting

_evaluation.recommendation: LOW - Limited relevance, consider as external factor only

ieee_fire_risk_prediction.name: Statistical and Machine Learning Models for Predicting Fire and Other Risks
ieee_fire_risk_prediction.description: ML models for anomaly detection in infrastructure. Adaptable to towers for risk prediction.
ieee_fire_risk_prediction.preprocessing_notes: IEEE paper on ML models for fire and risk prediction in infrastructure.
